name: Dorumon
effect: [On Play] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with [X-Antibody] in its traits and 1 [Kota Domoto] among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn][Once Per Turn] When one of your effects places a digivolution card under this Digimon, gain 1 memory.
